unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26 - As Diwali approaches, Indian manufacturers are placing renewed emphasis on inventory forecasting to optimize stock levels and avoid both shortages and overstocking. A recent report by the Indian Institute of Logistics Management (IILM) highlights the growing adoption of AI-powered forecasting tools in sectors ranging from textiles in Surat to auto components in Chennai.
